code: var baseUrl=process.env.NODE_ENV==='development'?'http://localhost:3001/api':'/api';function get(path){return call('GET',path);}function post(path,body){return call('POST',path,body);}function put(path,body){return call('PUT',path,body);}function del(path,body){return call('DELETE',path,body);}function call(method,path,body){return fetch("".concat(baseUrl).concat(path),{method:method,body:JSON.stringify(body),headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},credentials:'include'});}export{get,post,put,del,baseUrl};
